Key Match Events: Mike Yastrzemski hit a two-run homer in the 7th inning to put the Giants ahead for good in a 5-4 victory over the Brewers
Chapman’s Hot Bat Leads Giants’ Offense
Milwaukee’s Willy Adames and Jackson Chourio hit towering two-run homers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Giants played their fourth straight one-run game. They’ve gone 2-2 during that stretch.
Others: LHP Kyle Harrison (7-5, 4.00 ERA) pitches for the Giants and RHP Freddy Peralta (8-7, 3.86) starts for the Brewers when this three-game series continues Wednesday.
